head: Materials
desc: We process a wide range of plastics, including standard and high-performance polymers. Our expertise helps you to select the ideal material for your project - be it for high strength, flexibility or special chemical resistance.
desc2: We process a wide range of plastics, including standard and high-performance polymers. Our expertise helps you to select the ideal material for your project - be it for high strength, flexibility or special chemical resistance.

services.title: Injection moulded plastics
services.text1: We process all common plastics by injection moulding and support you in choosing the optimum material for your project. Below you will find a selection of the plastics that we process.

services.title: Speciality materials and additives
services.text1: We offer a wide range of speciality plastics and additives that enable special properties for specific requirements. This allows us to optimally customise materials for your individual projects.

text.test: Increased strength through glass fibre reinforcement
